name: Savior's Path
description:
The Savior's Path is a 2D adventure game that lets players help people through challenging emotional situations. The game takes place in various settings, such as homes, parks, and streets, where the player interacts with characters facing struggles such as grief, heartbreak, and fear. The game explores themes of empathy, compassion, and the power of human connection, and leaves players feeling uplifted and empowered.

Some of the Vector Graphic was designed by macrovector / Freepik

Most of the dialogues were generated by AI(ChatGPT), as well as Art(MJ).
